text: Pilar McShine (born 6 January 1987) is a Trinidad and Tobago international middle distance runner. McShine holds the Trinidad and Tobago women's national records for 1500m, 1 mile and 3000m, outdoors and 1500 and 1 mile indoors. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Date !Meet !Place !Ref |- |800 m |2:02.79 |5 July 2009 | | Havana, Cuba | |- |1500 m |4:13.21 |27 July 2013 |Memorial Geert Rasschaert | Ninove, Belgium | |- |Mile |4:36.79 |17 July 2013 |Morton Games | Finglas, Ireland | |- |3000 m |9:18.29 |9 April 2010 |FSU Seminole Invite | Tallahassee, United States | |- |5000 m |16:35.54 |18 April 2009 | | Coral Cables, Florida United States | |- |rowspan=2|1500 m (indoors) |4:36.87+ y |14 March 2009 |NCAA Division I Championships | College Station, Texas, United States | |- |4:35.99+ y OT |12 February 2010 |Husky Classic | Seattle, United States | |- |rowspan=2|Mile (indoors) |4:36.87 |14 March 2009 |NCAA Division I Championships | College Station, Texas, United States | |- |4:35.99 OT |12 February 2010 |Husky Classic | Seattle, United States | |} ==See also== * ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Trinidad and Tobago female middle- distance runners Category:1987 births
